bibl.title: Harpocration Panegyrista.
bibl.note: Revision and expansion of: A Panegyrist from Panopolis, Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists (London, 1975). In its present form, lecture at the University of Illinois on 13 February 1976. - Pétition d'Aurelius Ammon, scholasticus de Panopolis, au catholicus d'Égypte. 9 décembre 348. Cite des extraits d'autres papyrus appartenant aux archives d'Aurelius Ammon.
